import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Editor } from "react-draft-wysiwyg"; import { EditorState } from "draft-js"; import "react-draft-wysiwyg/dist/react-draft-wysiwyg.css"; import 'hts-react-form/styles/default.css'; import { HTSReactForm } from 'hts-react-form'; const Form = () => { const [recipients, setRecipients] = useState(null) const [subject, setSubject] = useState(null) const [emailbody, setEmailBody] = useState(null) const loginHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() } const [editorState, setEditorState] = useState(() => EditorState.createEmpty() ); useEffect(() => { console.log(editorState); }, [editorState]); return (
) } export default Form
